precaction: Remove any items from the table that you could knock off.
instruction: Prepare a scoop in front of you.
Sit comfortably with your right hand on the table.
Slowly rotate your forearm to turn your palm facing up.
Rotate your forearm again to turn your palm facing down.
Grab a scoop with your right hand.
Rotate your forearm to turn your palm up while holding the scoop.
Rotate your forearm to turn your palm down while holding the scoop.
Place the scoop on the table
